plafar.persistence.abstractions

Interface Persistent<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - This parameter is the object being persisted

    public interface Persistent<T>
    This interface describes the basic operations of data persistence at which objects can be exposed

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addObject(T object)
      This method adds a new object of type T to the database file
      boolean deleteObject(int objectId)
      This method is used to delete an existing object from the database
      boolean editObject(T object)
      This method is used to edit an existing object from database
      java.util.List<T> getAllObjects()
      This method returns all the available objects of type T from the database
      T getObject(int objectId)
      This method is used to retrieve an object from the database

    • Method Detail

      • addObject

        boolean addObject(T object)
        This method adds a new object of type T to the database file
        Parameters:
        object - - This is the object being added to the database
        Returns:
        boolean - The status of the operation (true - success, false - failure)

      • getObject

        T getObject(int objectId)
        This method is used to retrieve an object from the database
        Parameters:
        objectId - - This is the ID of the desired object
        Returns:
        T The object which id is equal to objectId

      • editObject

        boolean editObject(T object)
        This method is used to edit an existing object from database
        Parameters:
        object - - This is the edited object
        Returns:
        boolean - The status of the operation (true - success, false - failure)

      • deleteObject

        boolean deleteObject(int objectId)
        This method is used to delete an existing object from the database
        Parameters:
        objectId - - This is the ID of the object to be deleted
        Returns:
        boolean - The status of the operation (true - success, false - failure)

      • getAllObjects

        java.util.List<T> getAllObjects()
        This method returns all the available objects of type T from the database
        Returns:
        List - A list of all the objects
